action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac Lobbying Regulation Act of 2018
This bill prohibits the Federal National Mortgage Association (Fannie Mae) and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation (Freddie Mac) from engaging in lobbying activities while under conservatorship or receivership.
